ALC.NearestNeighbourCorrection¶

class ALC.nearest_neighbour_correction.NearestNeighbourCorrection(K=8, stopping_crit=0, conf_threshold=0.5)¶
Abstract: Iterate through every sample and classifiy it using the k-nearest neighors.

If the classifier predicts a different label with a confidence higher than some threshold, store the predicted label and mark the sample. After iterating through all samples once, all marked samples adopt their predicted label. Continue, till there is no more change in labels.

K: {int}, default = 8

Number of nearest neighbours to consider

stopping_crit: {int} >= 0, default = 0

conf_threshold: {float}, default = 0.5

.fit_transform(X, y)
